description:
Metro Awakening made a splash during the latest State of Play, with a new trailer showing off the atmospheric stealth VR experience for PSVR2, Meta Quest, and Steam VR launching on November 7. Metro Awakening is the latest entry in the post-apocalyptic franchise that spans games, books, and more. If you’re interested in learning more about the Metro universe ahead of Awakening’s arrival, then consider diving into the books that inspired the game series.

See the Metro book trilogy at Amazon

Written by Dmitr
title: Metro Books And Games Are Steeply Discounted Ahead Of Metro Awakening's Launch Later This Year

description:
SteelSeries has revealed the latest iteration of its popular Apex Pro keyboards, all of which are built around the new and improved Omnipoint 3.0 switches. These support 40 adjustable levels of actuation, are highly responsive, and offer a unique Protection Mode that helps eliminate accidental key presses. The Apex Pro Gen 3, Apex Pro TKL Gen 3, and Apex Pro TKL Wireless Gen 3 are all available right now--so give them a look if you want to update your battlestation before all the big holiday releases.

Along with the Omnipoint 3.0 switches, most other features are shared across the three devices. You’ll find
title: SteelSeries Releases New Flagship Apex Pro Keyboards

description: It's officially The Last of Us Day, and while the TV series might be hogging headlines with a tease of things to come, action figure fans are also in for a treat. As part of PlayStation's new line action figures, a two-pack of The Last of Us figures are up for preorder at Amazon. Featuring Joel and Ellie, this is priced at $50 and it comes with quite a few accessories. They'll be available starting November 1. Your new action figures could sit next to you on the couch and watch themselves in ultra-high definition if you pair the figure set with
title: The Last Of Us Official Action Figure Set Comes With Swappable Accessories (No Golf Clubs)

description:
The Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom has arrived, bringing Zelda's first starring role in a mainline entry to Nintendo Switch. This top-down Zelda experience isn't as chunky as its open-world counterparts, but it still has plenty to see, including both main story quests and side activities. Echoes of Wisdom marks another first for the series as well, marking the first game in the franchise to have a female director. Here's how long you can expect it to take to beat The Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom.

How long to beat The Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom

Echoes of Wisdom features an open-world map and its main story functions similarly to Tears of The Kingdom and Breath of the Wild in that you are given a few map markers to
title: How Long Is The Legend Of Zelda: Echoes Of Wisdom

description:
The Marvel Legends action figure line expanded this month with a special deluxe edition of the iconic Hulkbuster. Originally slated for an October 1 release, the Hulkbuster 85th Anniversary Deluxe Action Figure arrived a bit early and is in stock at Amazon for $60.

See at Amazon
title: Marvel Legends Hulkbuster Deluxe Action Figure Can Now Be Added To Your Collection
This 1TB PS5 SSD Is Only $65 With Amazon Lightning Deal

description:
Call of Duty: Warzone is currently in its sixth and final season with Modern Warfare 3, and the developer has announced that playlist options will now be limited until the battle royale integrates with Black Ops 6 later this year.

Normally, Warzone playlists would rotate weekly, changing the offerings between a mix of solo, duo, trio, and quads. Sometimes all of the options were available, and other times playlists like duos or solos were temporarily removed for the week. Unfortunately, all of that changes now as Raven Software has revealed that Warzone's playlists for Resurgence modes and standard battle royale are being consolidated, giving players fewer options to choose from.

Instead of weekly playlist rotations, players can e
title: Call Of Duty: Warzone Removes Several Popular Battle Royale Playlists

description: Woot is offering big discounts on some of the most popular Nintendo Switch games, making this a great time to pick up titles you may have missed over the past few years. Note that some Switch games offered by Woot are region-free imports--so while the ratings board logo on the box might look different, they’ll still run just fine on your console and function as if you bought them at your local retailer. Woot doesn't explicitly state which games are imports, but as long as that possibility doesn't bother you, you can get some Switch games for their lowest prices yet with Prime shipping.
title: Nintendo Switch Exclusives Get Huge Limited-Time Discounts, Including Zelda And Mario Games

description:
You could argue the current media landscape's obsession with crossovers, mash-ups, and hearty stews of intellectual property began with Funko Pop, collectible vinyl figures that have been popular for many years now and are made to resemble just about anything from pop culture--from rockstars and Star Trek villains, to cereal mascots and retired athletes. Before Fortnite became something like a Funko Pop game in its own way, Funko Pop figures were decorating mall stores and collectors' shelves with fan favorites and deep cuts. In retrospect, it's surprising we didn't get a Funko Pop console and PC game until now, though given the state of Funko Fusion, we would have been better off continuing to wait.

Presented in an over-the-(tiny)-shoulder third-person view akin to Lego Star Wars' latest effort, Funko Fusion similarly has you running around colorful worlds inspired by movies and TV shows you may a
title: Funko Fusion Review - Pop Til You Drop

description:
Humble has launched a new Dungeons & Dragons 5E Adventures bundle that will add dozens of new campaign modules and gameplay materials published by Goodman Games to your D&D library. The full bundle offers 39 items, including a physical copy of the Crypt of the Devil Lich adventure, plus digital books, printable maps, tokens, and more, adding up to $402 worth of Fifth Edition adventuring for just $30. To top it all off, you also get a coupon code for 20% off at the Goodman Games online store. The deal will be available at Humble until October 17.

Like other Humble Bundle deals, a portion of the Dungeons and Dragons 5E Adventures bundle sales goes to charity. Cust
title: New Humble TTRPG Book Bundle Includes Over 30 Dungeons & Dragons 5E Adventures

description:
The Last Of Us Season 2 Trailer Breakdown


In celebration of Outbreak Day/The Last of Us Day, fans had a lot to celebrate with Sony and Steam giving fans digital collectibles and avatars, even coupons for TLOU merch. However, not to be outdone, HBO released the first trailer for Season 2 of the series, showing fans the dark days that await Ellie (Bella Ramsey) and Joel (Pedro Pascal).

The trailer is stuffed with characters, references, and scenes from The Last of Us Part 2 that give us a glimpse of what is coming to the show including the Scars/Seraphites, WLF (Washingt
title: The Last Of Us Season 2 Trailer Breakdown: All The Easter Eggs And Video Game References

description:
Overwatch 2 is getting yet another anime crossover, this time with superhero shonen My Hero Academia.

The anime and manga, which revolves around high-school superheroes and villains battling for the future of a world where most people are born with some sort of special superpower (aka Quirk), is a good fit for Overwatch, which is itself a superhero-esque team of heroes and villains. My Hero Academia's manga ended earlier this year with chapter 430, though the anime is still ongoing.

There will be five My Hero Academia skins available for purchase as part of the limited-time event, with three hero and two villain skins to choose from. The skins will be available from October 17-30. They are:

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: Overwatch 2 Is Getting Another Anime Crossover, This Time With My Hero Academia

description:
The Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom has arrived, finally giving Zelda her turn as the lead of a mainline game. This 2D entry in the series features a brand new mechanic called Echoes, which are duplicates of various objects and monsters that Zelda can create. These Echoes are used to solve puzzles and as combat tools, so having a wide variety of them available is incredibly beneficial. There are a total of 127 Echoes in the game to collect.

Collecting Echoes is a fairly simple process in Echoes of Wisdom. For objects, those that can be copied sparkle, so you can easily spot them. For monsters, the first time you defeat a monster they will drop a small, floating version of themselves that you can copy. Once you copy an Echo for the first time, it is permanently added to y
title: All Echoes In The Legend Of Zelda: Echoes Of Wisdom

description:
The first trailer for Ballerina, a spin-off of the John Wick franchise, has been released. Ana de Armas stars as Rooney, a Ruska Roma ballerina seeking revenge against hitmen responsible for her family's murder. The film is set to hit theaters on June 6, 2025.

The storyline unfolds between John Wick Chapter 3: Parabellum and John Wick Chapter 4, focusing on the character originally introduced in the third film, portrayed by Unity Phelan. The trailer emphasizes Rooney's brutal quest for vengeance, featuring action sequences where she uses an ice skate as a weapon and uses a fire hose against a flamethrower.

Keanu Reeves re
title: Ballerina Trailer Puts Anna De Armas Center Stage In John Wick Universe

description:
It's been over a decade since the American version of The Office came to an end, but fans have continuously made it one of the most popular comedy series available to stream. Now, Meta and NBCUniversal are offering players a chance to become the latest employees of Dunder Mifflin's Scranton office in a new VR game, The Office World.

The Office World will be available on the Meta Horizon platform, and it lets players pick their desks at Dunder Mifflin before giving them minigames that were inspired by the show's nine-season run. The minigames and the office itself will also reference some of the show's best gags, including Kevin Malone's ill-fated chili and Dwight Schrute's stapler encased in Jello. Speaking of Dwight, players can earn Schrute Bucks to customize their desks and buy items from the company's vending machine.

However, the game seems
title: The Office Is Getting A Video Game Featuring Kevin's Chili And Schrute Bucks

description:
JRPG fans have been spoiled for choice lately with nostalgic remasters and retro-inspired games, and now, Threads of Time is entering the scene. Announced during the Xbox Showcase at the Tokyo Game Show, Threads of Time bills itself as a spiritual successor to Chrono Trigger and it has a similar aesthetic to Square Enix's HD-2D JRPGs like Live a Live and Octopath Traveler. It'll be launching for PC and Xbox Series X|S.

Developed by Riyo Games, Threads of Time unfolds across multiple e
title: Stylish Chrono Trigger-Like Threads Of Time Announced For PC And Xbox Series X|S

description: SteelSeries, the manufacturer behind multiple of the best headsets for consoles and PC, is jumping into the nascent gaming earbuds market with the Arctis GameBuds. Slated for release on October 29, these wireless gaming earbuds sport a 2.4GHz wireless connection with a compact dongle as well as Bluetooth with compatible devices. With the GameBuds, SteelSeries has sandwiched its speaker drivers inside tiny in-ear buds with active noise-canceling tech. SteelSeries Arctis GameBuds are available to preorder now for $160 at Best Buy.
title: SteelSeries Arctis GameBuds - Gaming Headset Leader Unveils First Wireless Earbuds

description:
A new entry in the Jackbox series launches in late October, but unlike the other games that were filled with various interactive experiences, The Jackbox Survey Scramble is going in a Family Feud-like direction. Billed as a brand-new collection of survey-based games, The Jackbox Survey Scramble will launch for PC, PS5, PS4, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Switch, Amazon Fire TV, and Apple TV toward the end of October.

The aim of the game is to think outside of the box and guess what the answers to surveys are. These are based on real surveys from across the globe, and include questions like, "In one word, what’s the cutest nickname for butts?" or, "In one word, what's the best sandwich topping?"In case you're wondering, the answer to both questions is "heavenly hams."

Jackbox Games says that The Jackbox Survey Scramble is designed to offer a constantly updated experience, as each guess submitted is the
title: The Next Jackbox Game Is A Silly Take On Family Feud

description:
The price of Horizon Zero Dawn on the PlayStation Store has been quietly doubled following Sony's announcement of its PS5 remaster earlier this week.

Spotted by MP1st, the digital version of Horizon Zero Dawn went from being $20 to now $40, regardless of region. At the moment, this price change affects both the PlayStation and PC versions. The game used to be part of the PS Plus PlayStation Hits lineup, but was removed earlier this year amid rumors of the PS5 remaster during that time.

The remaster costs $50, and those who already own the game on PS4 and PC can upgrade to the PS5 version for $10. It seems like Sony wanted to avoid a situation where
title: Horizon Zero Dawn's Price Just Doubled On PlayStation And PC

description:
Focus Entertainment has announced a new patch is now available for Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2, bringing ultrawide support for PC and private lobbies for PvE in Operation mode for the game. The update also adds a new special sparring stage to screw around with buddies.

On the Space Marine 2 community page, it's noted this new stage is called the Hub Sparring Arena. Players can find it in the Battle Barge for Operations and Eternal War modes, and it's a way to fight against friends before another mission. Meanwhile, the private lobbies let you team up with bots or another person instead of working with randoms. Other tweaks with the patch include an "option to reset custom color presets" and Veteran difficulty adjustments. Your health has decreased a tad, but so has enemy aggressiveness for this setting during campaign missions.
title: Major Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 Patch Goes Live With These New Additions
DualSense 30th Anniversary Edition Is Selling Out Fast At Major Retailers

description:
Earlier this week during Sony's State of Play, the company announced Ghost of Yotei, the first sequel to the acclaimed Ghost of Tsushima. But instead of continuing the story of Jin Sakai, Ghost of Yotei jumps ahead a few centuries and introduces a new female ronin named Atsu, who has adopted Jin's Ghost persona as her own. Somewhat predictably, Atsu's very existence has already sparked a backlash from gamers who don't want to play as a heroine. That led to a direct response from ex-Sony executive Shawn Layden.

Layden, who was the former chairman of Sony Interactive Entertainment Worldwide Studios, reacted to a post on
title: Former PlayStation Boss Has A Message For Ghost Of Yotei Haters

description:
Hobbit Day took place on September 22, celebrating the joyous joint birthdays of Bilbo and Frodo Baggins. With The Lord of the Rings on our minds, we're looking back at the time when author J.R.R. Tolkien described in great detail why a film treatment for The Lord of the Rings, sent to him in 1958, was a bad adaptation that made little sense and would simply not work.

The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien, edited by Humphrey Carpenter, is a treasure trove of tantalizing tales that includes hundreds of letters Tolkien wrote to various people throughout his life. The book is essential reading for any Lord of the Rings fan, as it provides a window into Tolkien's mind beyond the words he wrote on the page for The Hobbit and The Lord of the Rings. These letters inform us of Tolkien's daily life. The letters touch upon minutiae,
title: Remembering That Time JRR Tolkien Absolutely Hated A Lord Of The Rings Movie Pitch

description:
To celebrate The Last of Us Day, Sony announced it added The Last of Us Part I--the PS5 remaster--for PlayStation Plus Extra and Premium members. This is the third release of the game in 11 years so if you've missed out, you can jump in now with your PlayStation Plus account.

With the game's addition, starting today, Sony has added a lot of extras like account avatars that feature Joel and Ellie, and even a Clicker to personalize your profile. You need to redeem a voucher code that will be available on the PlayStation Plus site, as well as on The Last of Us page on the PS Plus hub on your homepage. All avatars will be available until October 26.
title: The Last of Us Part I Launches Into PlayStation Plus For Outbreak Day

description:
Naughty Dog's Neil Druckmann has teased that Season 2 of HBO's The Last of Us will include one particular scene that provides "a lot of backstory" for a major character. Speaking to Variety, Druckmann--who co-directed the first two games and also works on the show--said he thinks fans will enjoy this sequence, in part because it will provide more context than what was possible to provide in the game series.

"There's stuff in this season that I'm really excited about--stuff that we hinted at--one scene in particular comes to mind that I think fans of the game will eat up, because it really kind of tells you a lot of backstory of this important character that there wasn't really a way for us to even do that in the game," Druckmann said.

That's all Druckmann had to say about this particular scene. The game series is filled with significant charac
title: The Last Of Us Season 2 Includes Backstory Scene That Fans Will "Eat Up"

description:
Deadpool & Wolverine is now in its tenth week of release, and it was still in the top five at the box office last weekend. But with a digital release right around the corner, Marvel's first R-rated flick is winding down its theatrical run and looking ahead to awards season. And that includes some very ambitious plans for the film's co-headliner, Hugh Jackman.

According to Variety, Marvel is planning to submit Jackman's return performance as Wolverine for consideration in the Best Supporting Actor category at the Oscars. Jackman will also be pushed for similar awards from the Golden Globes, the Screen Actors Guild Awards, and the Critics Choice Awards. As for the film's other headliner, Ryan Reynolds, the studio will be submitting his name for best act
title: Marvel Wants Hugh Jackman To Get An Oscar Nomination For Deadpool & Wolverine

description: Last week, Sony revealed a new line of PS5 and PS5 Pro consoles to celebrate the 30th anniversary of PlayStation. Featuring a PS1 color scheme and nostalgic small details, these are expected to sell very quickly due to them being limited-edition releases. That's exactly what happened when preorders went live today in the UK, and predictably, several of these consoles are now listed on eBay at a very high price.
title: Sold-Out PS5 Pro Bundles Are Already Up On eBay, And Scalpers Want To Sell Them For Thousands

description: Because it was included in Metal Gear Solid: Master Collection Vol. 1, the events of Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater may be still be fresh in the minds of fans who revisited the franchise in 2023. That's why it feels a lot like deja vu to see the betrayal of Naked Snake play out all over again in the upcoming remake, Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater, which had a new trailer debut at the Tokyo Games Show.
title: New Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater Trailer Has Everything But A Release Date

description: Echoes of Wisdom may be a cute and simple-looking game, but you’d be surprised how intricate some of its systems can be, so here are 21 spoiler-friendly tips that can be accomplished in the open world within the first couple hours of the game.
title: The Legend Of Zelda Echoes Of Wisdom - 21 Things I Wish I Knew

description:
Microsoft has announced a series of changes and quality-of-life improvements to both Xbox's UI and the Xbox app on mobile devices and PC. The update includes the ability to pre-load games and game updates on Xbox consoles via the mobile app, although Microsoft hasn't yet announced a specific date when this feature will go live.

One feature has already gone live, however: Game Bar Compact Mode. Optimized for smaller screens, Game Bar Compact Modes allows users to more easily navigate the Xbox app on mobile or handheld Windows devices. It can also be used to rapidly exit a game that's currently running.

"With Compact Mode enabled, access to widgets and navigation is simplified to ensure you can get to the content you want as easily as possible on smaller screens," explained a recent Xbox blog post announcing the contents of the September update. "Compact Mode is also optimize
title: Xbox Fixes An Inexplicably Weird Choice And Improves Game Updates

description:
Nintendo visionary Shigeru Miyamoto has commented on the company's stance regarding artificial intelligence, saying the Mario maker aims to "go in a different direction."

Speaking to The New York Times, Miyamoto said Nintendo is often perceived as a company that bucks trends and does its own thing only for the sake of it. But that isn't true. It's an intentional effort to be different, Miyamoto said. And the same thinking applies for AI--whereas plenty of companies are adopting and embracing it, Nintendo may not.

Miyamoto said Nintendo's ambition is "trying to find what makes Nintendo special." He added: "There is a lot of talk about AI, for example. When that happens, everyone starts to go in the same direction, but that is where Nintendo would rather go in a different direction."
title: Mario Creator Shigeru Miyamoto Talks AI, Says Nintendo Wants To "Go In A Different Direction"

description:
Kyoto-based indie studio Denkiworks has announced its debut title, Tanuki: Pon's Summer, as part of Xbox's Tokyo Game Show broadcast. The cosy adventure game will have players taking on the role of a cute BMX-riding tanuki who also happens to be the mailman for a picturesque Japanese village.

The game shares some similarities with Animal Crossing, with summer activities including bug collecting and fishing, and a village full of quirky characters to interact with--but unlike Animal Crossing, the player character Pon is the only critter in a village otherwise populated by humans. Pon can build or break relationships with the other characters, interacting with a simple emoji-based interface.
title: Cursed To Golf Creator Announces Tanuki: Pon's Summer

description: Overwatch 2 has a new Plus Ultra collab coming. Play as some of your favorite My Hero Academia characters with the latest collab coming to Overwatch 2 showcased during Xbox's TGS Broadcast.
title: Overwatch 2 x My Hero Academia Collab Trailer

description:
Xbox's presentation for Tokyo Game Show included a number of Game Pass announcements, headlined by the news that StarCraft: Remastered and StarCraft 2 will be coming to the subscription service later this year. Four games were also newly added to Game Pass today, and more are in line for day one Game Pass releases. Here's everything new for Game Pass from TGS 2024.

Xbox's biggest Game Pass announcement for 2024 was that StarCraft: Remastered and StarCraft 2 will be added to PC Game Pass and Game Pass Ultimate on November 5 this year. The announcement was delivered by Xbox CEO Phil Spencer himself, who wore a StarCraft t-shirt to deliver the news.

Four games were also added to the service today: We Love Katamari ReRoll+ Royal Reverie, remastered editions of Trials of Mana and Legend of Mana
title: All The Game Pass Titles Announced At Xbox TGS 2024: StarCraft Remastered, Legend Of Mana, And More

description:
Xbox has returned to Japan for the Tokyo Game Show, and this year, it's showing off a selection of games from third-party partners based primarily in Japan. With 2025 looking to be a big year for the studio thanks to the arrival of games like Doom: The Dark Ages, South of Midnight, and more, Xbox has a lot of games to announce and provide updates on. In case the livestream is taking place at an hour that is way too early for you, you can check here for a recap of everything announced by Xbox.

We'll be updating this page regularly, so hit your F5 key to see the latest announcements, straight out of Tokyo.


Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater


The show kicked off with a fresh trailer for Metal
title: Xbox Tokyo Game Show 2024: All The Biggest Announcements

description: Showcased during XBox's TGS Broadcast get a new look at Metal Gear Solid: Delta Snake Eater.
title: Metal Gear Solid: Delta Snake Eater TGS 2024 Trailer
